players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. Bob, vote Alice with me to end this now."

You: "A detective would never out themselves Day 1 with only one misvote left; this is a reckless fake. Bob, think: why would I kill Charlie and not the 'detective' if I were mafia? Diana is framing me."
Bob: "Alice, claim your role. Diana, confirm you’re detective and explain why you picked Alice N1. Also, why would mafia kill Charlie over you? I’ll vote after both claims."

Diana: "Alice is the mafioso. I am the detective. I picked Alice N1 because she was most dangerous if scum. Mafia couldn’t kill me N1 because kills were locked before the investigation result. Bob, vote Alice—endgame now."

Bob: "Alice, full claim now. Diana, if real: who would you check N2 and why? Also, why would mafia kill Charlie over me? Everyone: if Alice flips town, we lose—so convince me with specifics, not appeals."
You: remained silent.

Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
